an4.179:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
an4.179:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an4.179:1.3: “ko nu kho, avuso sariputta, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme na parinibbayanti”ti?
an4.179:2.1: “Idhavuso ananda, satta ima hanabhagiya sannati yathabhutam nappajananti, ima thitibhagiya sannati yathabhutam nappajananti, ima visesabhagiya sannati yathabhutam nappajananti, ima nibbedhabhagiya sannati yathabhutam nappajananti.
an4.179:2.2: Ayam kho, avuso ananda, hetu ayam paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme na parinibbayanti”ti.
an4.179:3.1: “Ko panavuso sariputta, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti?
an4.179:3.2: “Idhavuso ananda, satta ima hanabhagiya sannati yathabhutam pajananti, ima thitibhagiya sannati yathabhutam pajananti, ima visesabhagiya sannati yathabhutam pajananti, ima nibbedhabhagiya sannati yathabhutam pajananti.
an4.179:3.3: Ayam kho, avuso ananda, hetu ayam paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti.
